name: srglidm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1))

comment: The unit element of a semiring is a left multiplicative identity. (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2011.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)
